w:r.w:t: $6.00 per week per lesson. Prepayment of entire course entitles you to one free lesson; see below for # of weeks. Semester registration fee is $5.00, non-refundable. Class times listed are for first night only. Specific class times

be assigned on registration night/day, split according to ability, age or rank for the remainder of the semester. Regular classes are 40 minutes long. Class times not known prior to registration night/day.

w:r.w:t: Advanced class fee is $10.00 per week for a 90 minute lesson.
Uniforms are available (not required) for $28.00 (tax included). Testing is available for rank promotion (not required) at the end of each semester for $10.00 (not including class fee).
- Classes held every Saturday for 13 weeks!
CAROL RAE RANCH ELEMENTARY SOCCER FIELD
Soccer ball ($12.00) and shin pads ($10.00/pair) are required by the 2nd week and are available at class or you may bring your own. Rubber cleats recommended; No metal cleats.
Classes held every Tuesday for 14 weeks!

Knee pads are available for $12.00. Tryouts for wrist-band levels are available (not required) at the end of each semester for $10.00 (not including class fee). Students should wear tennis shoes to class.
